content: If any of them ever did "serve", then they weren't in America's military.
reply: If any of them ever did "serve", then they weren't in America's military.
title: Westboro Baptist Church quits picketing military funerals, to pick on Santa!

content: If these folk ever meant the Good Lord holding the sign I saw on the news "Thank God for Dead Soldiers", they better hope his aim with the lighting bolt has gotten a little rusty over the years. Why? Cuz he's on our side, not this "church's" side. Besides that, these dim-wits give Christianity a bad name, leading no one to the Faith. This is truly sad.
